mapper.sql: id, process_inst_id, loan_base_info_id, loan_customer_id, loan_car_info_id, loan_financial_plan_id, loan_home_visit_id, material_audit_id, cost_details_id, remit_details_id, apply_license_plate_record_id, apply_license_plate_deposit_info_id, bank_lend_record_id,current_task_def_key, previous_task_def_key, status, gmt_create, gmt_modify, feature
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM loan_order WHERE current_task_def_key
IN ('usertask_credit_apply','usertask_credit_apply_verify', 'usertask_bank_credit_record','usertask_social_credit_record')
IN ('usertask_loan_apply','usertask_visit_verify', 'usertask_telephone_verify','usertask_info_supplement', 'usertask_business_review','usertask_loan_review', 'usertask_remit_review','usertask_material_review', 'usertask_material_print_review','usertask_car_insurance', 'usertask_apply_license_plate_record','usertask_apply_license_plate_deposit_info', 'usertask_install_gps','usertask_commit_key')
IN ('usertask_visit_verify','usertask_telephone_verify', 'usertask_info_supplement')
IN ('usertask_business_review','usertask_loan_review', 'usertask_remit_review','usertask_material_review', 'usertask_material_print_review','usertask_car_insurance', 'usertask_apply_license_plate_record','usertask_apply_license_plate_deposit_info', 'usertask_install_gps','usertask_commit_key')
IN ( 'usertask_credit_apply_verify','usertask_bank_credit_record', 'usertask_social_credit_record','usertask_loan_apply', 'usertask_visit_verify','usertask_telephone_verify', 'usertask_info_supplement','usertask_business_review', 'usertask_loan_review','usertask_material_review', 'usertask_material_print_review','usertask_car_insurance', 'usertask_apply_license_plate_record','usertask_apply_license_plate_deposit_info', 'usertask_install_gps','usertask_commit_key')
IN ('usertask_remit_review')
AND `status` = 0

SELECT
FROM loan_order WHERE current_task_def_key
IN ('usertask_credit_apply','usertask_credit_apply_verify', 'usertask_bank_credit_record','usertask_social_credit_record')
IN ('usertask_loan_apply','usertask_visit_verify', 'usertask_telephone_verify','usertask_info_supplement', 'usertask_business_review','usertask_loan_review', 'usertask_remit_review','usertask_material_review', 'usertask_material_print_review','usertask_car_insurance', 'usertask_apply_license_plate_record','usertask_apply_license_plate_deposit_info', 'usertask_install_gps','usertask_commit_key')
IN ('usertask_visit_verify','usertask_telephone_verify', 'usertask_info_supplement')
IN ('usertask_business_review','usertask_loan_review', 'usertask_remit_review','usertask_material_review', 'usertask_material_print_review','usertask_car_insurance', 'usertask_apply_license_plate_record','usertask_apply_license_plate_deposit_info', 'usertask_install_gps','usertask_commit_key')
IN ( 'usertask_credit_apply_verify','usertask_bank_credit_record', 'usertask_social_credit_record','usertask_loan_apply', 'usertask_visit_verify','usertask_telephone_verify', 'usertask_info_supplement','usertask_business_review', 'usertask_loan_review','usertask_material_review', 'usertask_material_print_review','usertask_car_insurance', 'usertask_apply_license_plate_record','usertask_apply_license_plate_deposit_info', 'usertask_install_gps','usertask_commit_key')
IN ('usertask_remit_review')
AND `status` = 0 ORDER BY gmt_create DESC LIMIT #{startRow}, #{pageSize}

select
from loan_order where loan_customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and status = '0'
mapper.insert: insert into loan_order (id, process_inst_id, loan_base_info_id, loan_customer_id, loan_car_info_id, loan_financial_plan_id, loan_home_visit_id, material_audit_id, cost_details_id, remit_details_id, apply_license_plate_record_id, apply_license_plate_deposit_info_id, bank_lend_record_id, current_task_def_key,previous_task_def_key, status, gmt_create,gmt_modify, feature) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{processInstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loanBaseInfoId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{loanCustomerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{loanCarInfoId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{loanFinancialPlanId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{loanHomeVisitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{materialAuditId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{costDetailsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{remitDetailsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{applyLicensePlateRecordId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{applyLicensePlateDepositInfoId,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{bankLendRecordId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{currentTaskDefKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{previousTaskDefKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{feature,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update loan_order
process_inst_id = #{processInstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
loan_base_info_id = #{loanBaseInfoId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
loan_customer_id = #{loanCustomerId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
loan_car_info_id = #{loanCarInfoId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
loan_financial_plan_id = #{loanFinancialPlanId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
loan_home_visit_id = #{loanHomeVisitId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
material_audit_id = #{materialAuditId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
cost_details_id = #{costDetailsId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
remit_details_id = #{remitDetailsId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
apply_license_plate_record_id = #{applyLicensePlateRecordId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
apply_license_plate_deposit_info_id = #{applyLicensePlateDepositInfoId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
bank_lend_record_id = #{bankLendRecordId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
current_task_def_key = #{currentTaskDefKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
previous_task_def_key = #{previousTaskDefKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modify = #{gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
feature = #{feature,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update loan_order set process_inst_id = #{processInstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, loan_base_info_id = #{loanBaseInfoId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, loan_customer_id = #{loanCustomerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, loan_car_info_id = #{loanCarInfoId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, loan_financial_plan_id = #{loanFinancialPlanId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, loan_home_visit_id = #{loanHomeVisitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, material_audit_id = #{materialAuditId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, cost_details_id = #{costDetailsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, remit_details_id = #{remitDetailsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, apply_license_plate_record_id = #{applyLicensePlateRecordId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, apply_license_plate_deposit_info_id = #{applyLicensePlateDepositInfoId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, bank_lend_record_id = #{bankLendRecordId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, current_task_def_key = #{currentTaskDefKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, previous_task_def_key = #{previousTaskDefKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modify = #{gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, feature = #{feature,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
